OrgName.entry: CHURCH OF JESUS CHRIST OF LATTER DAY SAINTS, SHEFFIELD 1ST WARD

Desc.entry: Holds Sunday Church Services, youth and other activities midweek. Can also arrange family or personal study opportunties to learn more about the Saviour's teachings.

ProvisionPlace.entry: Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints, Sheffield 1st Ward

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sun at 10am (Sunday School), 11.50am-1pm (Family Service), Tues at 7.30pm (youth activities). Please contact for a list of other activities for children, adults and whole families
